alert.note: Alert for Alaska Peninsula (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 05 at 3:21PM AKST until January 06 at 4:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 4 PM AKST SATURDAY FROM COLD BAY WEST TO FALSE PASS... * WHAT...South winds 35 to 50 mph with gusts up to 80 mph expected. * WHERE...Along the Alaska Peninsula from Cold Bay west to False Pass. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 4 PM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property, and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind gusts for other communities along the Alaska Peninsula, including King Cove and Sand Point, will peak at 45 to 65 mph.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind. Prepare for the possibility of widespread power outages. Use caution if you must drive.
